name: Link the Dot
description:
Link of Dot is the perfect indie game for lovers of games based on mental challenges, perfect to exercise the brain while you spend a great time playing.In addition, despite being able to be a difficult game for certain players, the difficulty is scalable as you advance levels, that will allow you to improve in solving levels and be able to complete the game 100%.


In Link the Dot, in each level you will face a different challenge, with the same rules but different disposition and difficulty.
You will have to join the two points of the same color with lines that the player will draw, and they will be of the same color as the points they join, to help visually solve the challenges.
You have to keep in mind that many times the space in each level will be just right, so there will not be any space left over, or there will be levels where one space may be unoccupied, and all the points together. In that case, you will have to engineer them to be able to join all the points correctly and also occupy all the space, because otherwise the level will not be solved.

How to play:

-Use your mouse to navigate throught the menu and to play.
